response_parsed.title: Containerizing Edge Runtimes using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+. We will use Docker and Uvicorn as the ASGI server.
key_points: Running and testing the containerized FastAPI app

code_examples.code:
FROM tiangolo/uvicorn-fastapi:python3.10
WORKDIR /app
COPY ./app /app
EXPOSE 8000
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]

version_notes: Docker version 20.10.7 or later is suggested for running the Dockerfile.
caveats: Ensure you have Docker installed and running before attempting this tutorial.
Uvicorn's ASGI server is used in this example, but other servers like Sanic ASGI Server can also be used for containerizing FastAPI applications.
